EmailTemplate.description: FTTA. Created to send email notification to PI and PM
EmailTemplate.name: Email Notification to PI&PM - At Signature using HTML
EmailTemplate.subject: EPA File # {!EPA_Agreement__c.EPA_File_2__c} - At Signature
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
OGC concurred on EPA File # {!EPA_Agreement__c.00Nr0000001VPB9}. Please work with your FTTA lab contact to acquire Partner and EPA signatures. Please email FTTA@epa.gov with any questions.
Thank you.
